EmailTemplate.subject: Special Pricing on the World’s Most Popular Airbus APU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Do You Want to Lower Your Airline Operating Costs?
We’re now offering limited-time, special pricing that includes a new APU and a 10-year support plan, for both your old and new APU.
The 131-9A has proven its superiority in more than 56 million hours of operation, with industry-leading performance, reliability, in-region service, and costs savings. With the 131-9A, you’ll experience:
• 2.5X more reliable • 5% lower fuel burn • New engine warranty • Fewer delays and cancellations • Fleet commonality for your Airbus aircraft • Easy installation using Airbus Service Bulletin 49-1055
Now’s the time to upgrade to the best APU flying – Honeywell’s renowned 131-9A, which already flies on more Airbus A320s than any other APU.
Contact us today to learn more about this exciting offer.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/APU_131-9A.html]]>
